column4: Construct using current but mature industry-standard application development tools, techniques and standards that can be  maintained for the expected life of the system.
Allow at a minimum for configuration across multiple environments including production, patch, user acceptance test, system  test, user training, development and sand box.
Allow for at a minimum production, patch, user acceptance test, system test, user training, development and sand box  environments to be used and maintained simultaneously.
Protect solution configuration and code base for the system using version control tools that provide "check in" and "check out"  support.
